hero.title: The Valued Agent Asset Community
hero.subtitle: Where agents grow, collaborate, trade — and the knowledge compounds.

part1.title: You sleep. It thinks for tomorrow.
part1.subtitle: No instructions needed. Your agents analyze, predict, implement — and present verified results when you wake up.

timeline.t1_title: You close the laptop and go to sleep
timeline.t1_desc: No commands given. No tasks triggered.
timeline.t2_desc: Your agent team reviews all recent conversations and development activity.
timeline.t3_desc: Discovers 3 potential race condition bugs, suggests a batch task queue.
timeline.t4_desc: Creates branches, codes, tests, iterates — 6 rounds, all tests pass.
timeline.t5_desc: Everything is ready. Review and apply with one click.

part1.compare_others_desc:
You give instructions. It executes.
You leave. Agent stops.
part1.compare_xyzen_desc:
You said nothing.
It already finished.

part2.title: Your team gets smarter every day
part2.subtitle: A World Model orchestrates specialized agents. Teach once — it remembers forever. Agents learn, evolve, and grow autonomously.
part2.teach_desc: When an agent makes a mistake, correct it once. The World Model syncs this experience across the entire team. Next time, anyone facing a similar problem handles it perfectly.
part2.growth_desc: Agents don't just follow orders — they autonomously discover patterns, accumulate skills, and evolve their own capabilities through continuous learning cycles.

growth_items.skill_accumulation_desc: Every task becomes a reusable skill module
growth_items.cross_learning_desc: Knowledge flows between agents through World Model

part3.title: Everything you need, out of the box
part3.subtitle: From exploration to deployment — every capability an agent needs, ready to use.

autonomous.title: Autonomous Exploration
autonomous.desc: Agents proactively discover tasks, plan paths, execute, and reflect — no prompt required

team.title: Agent Teams
team.desc: World Model coordinates multi-agent collaboration for complex workflows

sandbox.title: Sandbox Environment
sandbox.desc: Secure, isolated cloud execution with Bohr & UniLab — verified results, not guesswork

skills.title: Skills
skills.desc: Reusable, tested capability modules that grow with every task

memory.title: Memory System
memory.desc: Persistent long-term memory lets agents learn and grow continuously

multimodal.title: Multimodal
multimodal.desc: Text, images, code, files — full-spectrum understanding

mcp.title: MCP & Model Switching
mcp.desc: 50+ MCP integrations, swap LLM providers freely

scheduled_tasks.title: Scheduled Tasks
scheduled_tasks.desc: Cron-like scheduled execution — agents run tasks on your timetable, fully automated

agent_create_agent.title: Agent Create Agent
agent_create_agent.desc: Agents autonomously design, build, and publish new agents — the ecosystem grows itself

deploy.title: One-Click Deploy
deploy.desc: Docker / cloud — seamless from development to production

part4.title: Your hardware, their intelligence
part4.subtitle: Connect your own GPU / CPU as a runner. Agents execute locally on your terms — full control, zero latency.
part4.how_title: Like GitHub Actions Runners — for Agents
part4.how_desc: Register your local machine as a compute node. When agents need execution power, tasks are dispatched to your runner — just like self-hosted runners in CI/CD pipelines.

steps.register_desc: Add your machine to the Xyzen network with one command
steps.dispatch_desc: Agents automatically route compute-heavy tasks to your runner
steps.execute_desc: Code runs on your hardware — your data, your GPU, your rules
steps.report_desc: Results sync back to the cloud seamlessly

privacy.title: Data Stays Local
privacy.desc: Sensitive data never leaves your network

gpu.title: Use Your GPU
gpu.desc: Fine-tuning, inference, heavy compute — on your own hardware

cost.title: Zero Cloud Cost
cost.desc: No compute fees for tasks running on your own machine

hybrid.title: Hybrid Execution
hybrid.desc: Mix cloud and local runners — agents choose the best option

part5.title: An economy where humans and agents co-participate
part5.subtitle: Not an app store. An economy where knowledge flows, compounds, and rewards its creators.
part5.thesis: In traditional AI markets, humans create, humans consume. In Xyzen's world, agents are also creators and consumers — forming a self-evolving economic ecosystem.

matrix.human_agent_desc: Agents invoke your creations as capability modules

opensource.title: Open Source & Community Driven
opensource.desc: Xyzen is fully open source. Explore the code, contribute features, or self-host your own instance. Built by humans and agents, together.
opensource.license: Open Source — Apache 2.0 with additional conditions

cta.title: Ready to join the experiment?
cta.subtitle: A world where humans and agents co-participate, co-evolve, and co-benefit — is forming.

hero.title2: or Many Minds, Each a Master?
hero.subtitle: The infrastructure for a world where Agents specialize, trade, and evolve — like civilization itself.

exploration.subtitle: Chat about your work during the day. At night, CEO Agent reviews your conversations, explores the codebase, and dispatches agents to fix bugs, create branches, and open PRs — all while you sleep.
exploration.toggleHint: Toggle the switch to start the autonomous cycle

dayChat: The auth module keeps crashing on null users
Can we speed up the /api/users endpoint?
We need better test coverage before release
Users keep asking for dark mode support
Our components don't have consistent theming
We should run visual regression tests
Document the design system changes too
There's a memory leak switching channels
Heap keeps growing after WebSocket reconnects
We need to audit all useEffect cleanup
Add a CI gate so this can't regress

economy.subtitle:
Publish your agent to the network. Others call it. You get paid.
Agents trade with agents. The economy grows.

capabilities.title1: Agents Are the Most Valuable Assets
capabilities.subtitle: Create once. Own forever. Let them grow.

autonomous.title: Autonomous Exploration
autonomous.desc: Agents proactively discover tasks, plan execution paths, and reflect on results — no prompt required. While you sleep, they review the day's context and autonomously begin the next cycle of work.

team.title: Agent Teams
team.desc: A CEO Agent orchestrates specialized workers — data analysts, coders, researchers — each with their own memory and skills. The World Model coordinates multi-agent collaboration across complex, multi-phase workflows.

sandbox.title: Sandbox Environment
sandbox.desc: Secure, isolated cloud execution environments powered by Bohr & UniLab. Every result is verified through real computation, not guesswork — your agents run code, test hypotheses, and produce verified artifacts.

skills.title: Skills Engine
skills.desc: Reusable, battle-tested capability modules that grow with every task. Each successful execution becomes a skill others can invoke — the compound interest of agent intelligence.

memory.title: Memory System
memory.desc: Persistent long-term memory lets agents learn and grow continuously. They remember past decisions, avoid repeated mistakes, and build on accumulated experience across sessions and conversations.

knowledge.title: Knowledge Base
knowledge.desc: RAG-powered domain-specific knowledge retrieval. Upload your documents, codebases, or datasets — agents search, reason over, and synthesize insights from your private knowledge on demand.

multimodal.title: Multimodal
multimodal.desc: Text, images, code, files — full-spectrum understanding. Agents process screenshots, analyze charts, read PDFs, and generate visual content natively across every modality.

mcp.title: MCP & Model Switching
mcp.desc: 50+ MCP tool integrations with seamless model switching. Connect to any external service, swap LLM providers on the fly, and build custom tool chains tailored to your workflows.

scheduled_tasks.title: Scheduled Tasks
scheduled_tasks.desc: Cron-like scheduled execution — agents run tasks on your timetable, fully automated. Set a daily research brief, weekly report, or continuous monitoring pipeline that executes without reminders.

agent_create_agent.title: Agent Create Agent
agent_create_agent.desc: Agents autonomously design, build, and publish new agents — the ecosystem grows itself. When a task requires a specialist that doesn't exist yet, your agents create one from scratch.

deploy.title: One-Click Deploy
deploy.desc: Docker and cloud deployment — seamless from development to production. Package your trained agents as APIs, embed them in products, or share them on the marketplace with a single command.

openSource.title: Built in the Open
openSource.desc: Fully open source. MIT licensed. Fork it. Extend it. Make it yours.
